Text.Page:
Aside from his scouts and the beasts, Thulsa has an assault brigade stationed at the western gate to Habere. Take them out, and we'll all breathe easier

You've been very brave so far, so stay the course! Check in with Centurion Turua at the western gate. He'll point you toward Thulsa's minions.

Let me brief you on our situation, .

Warkul commands Thulsa's forces in the region. Repelling Warkul and his troopers will give us a huge advantage in battle, perhaps a chance to reverse the situation throughout this wretched land.

Lead us to victory, !

The remnants remain, but they pose no threat to the safety of Habere.

Thank you so much, .
